name: Base Platform
description: Essential platform features including User Management, Dashboards, and Basic Settings. Required for all tenants.

name: CRM Module
description: Complete Customer Relationship Management with Leads, Contacts, and Activities tracking.

name: Leave Management
description: Comprehensive leave tracking, policies, balances, and approval workflows.

name: Project Management
description: Manage Projects, Client details, and Tasks to streamline team coordination.

name: Timesheet Management
description: Time logging, approval cycles, and productivity reporting.

name: Stand-up Module
description: Daily synchronous or asynchronous stand-up meetings and task check-ins.

name: Salary / Payroll
description: Payroll processing, Salary structures, and Payslip generation.
